name: social-media-app-mern
description: A Social Media app using MERN Stack with Restful API

scripts.start: concurrently npm "npm run front" "npm run back"
scripts.reference-frontend: cd Ref/ && cd youtube-react-blog-ui && npm start
scripts.reference-backend: cd Ref/ && cd youtube-blog-rest-api && npm start
scripts.reference: concurrently npm "npm run reference-frontend" "npm run reference-backend"

author: N LirajKhanna
